# asaya-sculpture-utils

Simple utility functions for sculpture and art gallery websites.

## Installation

pip install asaya-sculpture-utils

## Usage

from asaya_sculpture_utils import format_dimensions, calculate_volume

# Format artwork dimensions
print(format_dimensions(50, 30, 20))
# Output: "50 × 30 × 20 cm"

# Calculate volume
print(calculate_volume(50, 30, 20))
# Output: 30000
